instructions: Make sure your device is connected to Wi-Fi or a cellular network. When your device isn t connected to Wi-FI or a cellular network, you won t see your current location (blue dot) on the map or the distance between you and your friends in the Friends list. Make sure you allow Find My Friends to access your location. Depending on your browser settings, you are asked to allow access to your location. To change your settings for Safari on an iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, go to Settings > Privacy > Location Services, tap Safari Websites, then select While Using the App.
